title: Can't login in EUROPE WEST .
body:
how many centuries do i have to wait before u fix ur game login system ? i can't login .
https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_GB#euw

replies.body: It looks like we had some issues with the EUW login server over night, but it looks like they've been cleared up by now. Hit me back up if you're still having issues getting logged in!
same here also i cant log in
